title: How to fall in love with books - Quora

response.answer_text: What is your favorite subject ?  Start from there, books can give you knowledge, information and entertain you. They can take you away on a far of land without you moving anywhere. You can live a thousand lives in this life itself. There are millions of books out of them you would love at least a thousand. If there is magic, it is in books more than in real life. Start with something you love and once you start you will slowly be pulled into it by its magic. If you want a greatest friend it is a book . They will not cheat you, they will listen to you, they will be your best friends if you let them be. they will make you think and make you smarter than others. Happy reading.
